top_stories.title: OpenAI claims to have hit $10B in annual revenue
top_stories.description: OpenAI says it recently hit $10 billion in annual recurring revenue, up from around $5.5 billion last year.
top_stories.author: Kyle Wiggers

top_stories.title: From spatial widgets to realistic Personas: All the visionOS updates Apple announced at WWDC
top_stories.description: Apple’s updates to VisionOS 26, the operating system powering its mixed reality headset, build off last year’s Apple Vision Pro spatial computer that blends digital content with the physical world. At WWDC, Apple announced a range of updates for both consumer and enterprise customers, from new spatial widgets and content to more realistic Personas and more.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Bellan

top_stories.title: At WWDC 2025, Apple introduces an AI-powered Shortcuts app
top_stories.description: Users will be able to access the AI models either on device or with Private Compute to generate responses that feed into the rest of their shortcut.
top_stories.author: Sarah Perez

top_stories.title: Apple’s new Workout Buddy helps you sweat smarter
top_stories.description: Apple has launched at its WWDC 2025 conference Workout Buddy, an AI workout coach. The AI tool gathers data from both your current workout and your fitness history – including paces, miles logged, activity rings closed, and training load – to coach you through workouts in real time.
top_stories.author: Rebecca Bellan

top_stories.title: Apple brings Apple Intelligence to the iPhone screen at WWDC 2025
top_stories.description: Apple said it's bringing Visual Intelligence, its AI-powered image analysis tech, to the iPhone screen in iOS 26.
top_stories.author: Kyle Wiggers
